standard_pose: The subject standing straight, slightly turned towards the camera, one leg slightly forward
seated_pose: The subject sitting on a chair or the floor, one leg bent at an angle, the other leg extended
hand_on_hip_pose: The subject with one hand on the hip, the other arm relaxed by the side or raised
leaning_pose: The subject leaning slightly forward to create a dynamic and engaging look
head_turn_pose: The subject looking to the side instead of directly at the camera, adding a touch of mystery
dynamic_pose: The subject in motion, such as stepping forward or turning the body for an energetic effect
accessory_pose: The subject holding a bag or another accessory, emphasizing the details of the outfit
crossed_legs_pose: The subject standing with crossed legs, creating an interesting silhouette
wall_lean_pose: The subject leaning against a wall, giving a relaxed and casual appearance
group_pose: Multiple models arranged in a balanced manner, creating a sense of connection and interaction
